name: Project Blessed Hammer
description:
Project Blessed Hammer is an ARPG in which the player follows the feats of Hammerin, a paladin looking to rid the world of the evil Olbaid.

His search has led him to a cold plain where risens and their witches are known to be active.

Will you be able to vanquish the evil of this world as Hammerin!?

Names, characters design, gameplay design and events are either the products of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any ressemblence with another ARPG is purely coincidental.

Or is it?
